welcome: Welcome on the framework Mora cli
firewall_check_comment: return the required condition to pass the firewall
firewall_onfailed_comment: Put the action to do if a this firewall is not passed
controller_create_desc: Create a new controller and set optionaly its actions
rename_required_names: Old name and new name required.
firewall_rename_success: The firewall {old}'s name was changed to {new}.
firewall_name_conflict: The name {name} is already used by another firewall.
controller_confirm_delete: <red>Do you really want to delete this controller?<nc>(yes/no)[<yellow>yes<nc>]:
controller_create_succes: The controller {name} was created with success.
controller_action_create: The controller {name} with action(s) {actions} was created with success.
controller_delete_succes: The {name} controller was deleted with success.
name: name
create_controller_desc: Create a new controller class in 'App/Controller/<cyan>Name<nc>Controller.php' with listed <cyan>actions<nc> as methods.
